channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Privileged Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Privileged Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2016-5959|2024-08-06T01:15:10.641Z -- ibm -- security%20privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager 2.0.2 and 2.1.0 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 116136.

item.title: CVE-2016-5960|2024-08-06T01:15:10.795Z -- ibm -- security%20privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager 2.0.2 and 2.1.0 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 116171.
